ClassDesc: Constants for specifying metadata about a media item as a https:##developer#android#com@B_android#os#Bundle_E@. This class is part of the remote playback protocol described by the @B_android#support#v7#media#MediaControlIntent_E@ class. Media item metadata is described as a bundle of key/value pairs as defined in this class. The documentation specifies the type of value associated with each key. An application may specify additional custom metadata keys but there is no guarantee that they will be recognized by the destination.
